title: Introduction to Web testing in Katalon Studio
description: This is a basic tutorial about how to begin testing with Katalon Studio. If you are completely new to Katalon Studio or have just begun testing with the app, this document is for you. We will go over a few principal steps, basic concepts, and operations in Katalon Studio. You will learn how to create projects, create, verify, debug, plan and execute test cases.

frontMatter.title: Introduction to Web testing in Katalon Studio
